mapper.select:
select '全年度' title, '单位：元' subTitle,
s.user_name reportName,
sum(t.income_amount) reportNum, to_number(substr(to_char(t.income_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4)) reportDate from sys_income t, sys_user s where t.user_id = s.user_id
and t.user_id = #{userId}
group by
s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.income_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4)) order by
s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.income_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4))

select #{reportValue} || '年' title, '单位：元' subTitle,
s.user_name reportName,
sum(t.income_amount) reportNum, to_number(substr(to_char(t.income_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 5, 2)) reportDate from sys_income t, sys_user s where t.user_id = s.user_id and substr(to_char(t.income_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4) = #{reportValue}
and t.user_id = #{userId}
group by
s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.income_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 5, 2)) order by
s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.income_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 5, 2))

select
u.user_name title,
'家庭' title,
'单位：元' subtitle, s.dictionary_caption reportName, sum(t.income_amount) reportNum from sys_income t, sys_dictionary s, sys_user u where t.income_company = s.dictionary_code || '-' || s.dictionary_item and t.user_id = u.user_id
and t.user_id = #{userId}
group by s.dictionary_caption
, u.user_name
order by s.dictionary_caption

select
b.user_name title,
'家庭' title,
'单位：元' subtitle, s.dictionary_caption reportName, sum(t.income_amount) reportNum from sys_income t, sys_dictionary s, sys_user b where t.income_type = s.dictionary_code || '-' || s.dictionary_item and t.user_id = b.user_id
and t.user_id = #{userId}
group by s.dictionary_caption
, b.user_name
order by s.dictionary_caption

select title, '单位：元' subtitle, reportName, reportNum from (select
b.user_name title,
'家庭' title,
c.dictionary_caption || ' - ' || s.dictionary_caption reportName, max(t.income_amount) reportNum from sys_income t, sys_dictionary s, sys_user b, sys_dictionary c where t.income_type = s.dictionary_code || '-' || s.dictionary_item and t.income_company = c.dictionary_code || '-' || c.dictionary_item and t.user_id = b.user_id
and t.user_id = #{userId}
group by s.dictionary_caption, c.dictionary_caption
, b.user_name
order by max(t.income_amount) desc ) m where rownum = 1 union all select title, '单位：元' subtitle, reportName, reportNum from (select
b.user_name title,
'家庭' title,
c.dictionary_caption || ' - ' || s.dictionary_caption reportName, min(t.income_amount) reportNum from sys_income t, sys_dictionary s, sys_user b, sys_dictionary c where t.income_type = s.dictionary_code || '-' || s.dictionary_item and t.income_company = c.dictionary_code || '-' || c.dictionary_item and t.user_id = b.user_id
and t.user_id = #{userId}
group by s.dictionary_caption, c.dictionary_caption
, b.user_name
order by min(t.income_amount) ) s where rownum = 1

select '全年度' title, '单位：元' subTitle,
s.user_name reportName,
sum(t.gift_amount) reportNum, to_number(substr(to_char(t.gift_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4)) reportDate from sys_gift t, sys_user s where 1=1
and substr(t.gift_sender, instr(t.gift_sender, '-') + 1) = s.user_id
and substr(t.gift_receiver, instr(t.gift_receiver, '-') + 1) = s.user_id
and substr(t.gift_sender, instr(gift_sender, '-') + 1) = #{giftSender}
and substr(t.gift_receiver, instr(gift_receiver, '-') + 1) = #{giftReceiver}
group by
s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.gift_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4)) order by
s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.gift_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4))

sum(t.gift_amount) reportNum, to_number(substr(to_char(t.gift_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 5, 2)) reportDate from sys_gift t, sys_user s where 1=1

s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.gift_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 5, 2))
